item.title: Integrating your Tesla with Home Assistant
item.description: Having a sweet electric car is sweet indeed. But integrating it with your home automation system, that’s even sweeter! Fortunately Home Assistant has a native integration through Tesla’s cloud and with some Lovelace magic we can make the most out of it on our Dashboards.
